author: Tyler McCarthy
title: 'Game of Thrones' actor Kristofer Hivju reveals he's fully recovered from coronavirus
description: “Game of Thrones” actor Kristofer Hivju revealed that he and his wife are fully recovered after testing positive for the coronavirus weeks ago.
content:
